changeSet.author: JProfessionals
changeSet.comment: Add consultant column to user table (default true, most users are consultants)

changeSet.author: JProfessionals
changeSet.sql: UPDATE user SET consultant = false WHERE email = 'steinar@jpro.no';
UPDATE user SET consultant = false WHERE email = 'hege@jpro.no';
UPDATE user SET consultant = false WHERE email = 'roger@jpro.no';
UPDATE user SET consultant = false WHERE email = 'christel@jpro.no';
UPDATE user SET consultant = false WHERE email = 'morten@jpro.no';
UPDATE user SET consultant = false WHERE email = 'amalie@jpro.no';
UPDATE user SET consultant = false WHERE email = 'elisabeth@jpro.no';
